fields.label: Procedure ID
fields.name: procedure_id
fields.hint: Unique identifier for this specific procedure.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.hint: Enter the title of the procedure.

fields.label: Category
fields.name: category
fields.hint: Category of the procedure (e.g., Calibration, Diagnostics, Flight Performance).

fields.label: Created By
fields.name: created_by
fields.hint: Name of the individual or team creating this procedure.

fields.label: Goal
fields.name: goal
fields.hint: Describe the objective of this procedure.

fields.label: Method
fields.name: method
fields.hint: Detail the method of execution, including step-by-step actions.

fields.label: Iterations
fields.name: iterations
fields.hint: Number of iterations needed to validate the procedure.

fields.label: Test Parameters
fields.name: test_parameters
fields.hint: Specific parameters to be observed or manipulated during the procedure.

fields.label: Crew Needed
fields.name: crew_needed
fields.hint: Minimum number of personnel required to safely execute the procedure.

fields.label: Safety Considerations
fields.name: safety_considerations
fields.hint: Identify any safety risks and the measures taken to mitigate them.

fields.label: Failsafe Measures
fields.name: failsafe_measures
fields.hint: Outline the failsafe procedures in case of unexpected issues or emergencies.

fields.label: Regulatory Compliance
fields.name: regulatory_compliance
fields.hint: Describe any regulatory compliance considerations or requirements.

fields.label: Documentation Required
fields.name: documentation_required
fields.hint: Specify any documentation that must be completed as part of the procedure.

fields.label: Success Criteria
fields.name: success_criteria
fields.hint: Define the criteria that will be used to evaluate the success of the procedure.

fields.label: Analysis Method
fields.name: analysis_method
fields.hint: If applicable, describe the method for analyzing the results of the procedure.
